thread.title: Blue Horizon casino ship not sailing from Port of PBuntil Sept.
thread.title_full: Blue Horizon casino ship not sailing from Port of PBuntil Sept. | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Susan Salisbury
title: Blue Horizon casino ship not sailing from Port of PBuntil Sept.
text:
The Blue Horizon, a casino ship that launched at the Port of Palm Beach July 17, is going into dry dock until September and its two engines will be replaced for $1 million.
A lightning strike also hit its cell tower on the roof of the portâ€™s administration building last week, knocking out the communications system to the boat, impacting its Internet, ATMs and sports book kiosks, said Robert Weisberg, managing director of PB Gaming.
